item.title: Microsoft Purview - MindMaps
item.author: Author
item.description: Administering Information Protection and Compliance in Microsoft 365 During my SC-400 studies I created the following two MindMaps. Good to know: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal compliance.microsoft.com (Data security + Risk and compliance MindMap) Microsoft Purview Governance Portal web.purview.azure.com The new Microsoft Purview Portal: purview.microsoft.com The settings highlighted in blue on the Purview Compliance Portal are addressed in the Data Security Solutions Mind Map, while the settings highlighted in yellow are covered in the Risk and Compliance Mind Map:
